_sText:
Title: Surf_rofl_beta map by daZ Map: Surf_rofl_beta Made by: Marco AKA: DaZ Release Date: 12-12-2005 BSP size: 3.089.868 bites  

This is my first map and i am planning to make more. Special thanks to: - Evil_Bob (for betatesting and some ideas) - Halflife-2.nl forum - All the people that where in my server when the alpha was tested. (Yes you ;)) - Snake (for realy realy latest minute final test ;)) DESCRIPTION: This is a so called Surf map. You have to slide down the "ramps" to get to the end. at the end there are teleporters to the start and so on. INSTALLATION: put the bsp file in \Valve\Steam\SteamApps/(your username)/counter-strike source/cstrike/maps You may NOT edit the bsp file without my permission. Dont forget to enjoy.
